headlines.description: Jamie Drysdale scored the tiebreaking goal, Ivan Fedotov stopped 28 shots, and the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Nashville Predators 2-1 on Monday night for their third straight win under interim coach Brad Shaw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Drysdale, Fedotov help Flyers beat Predators 2-1 for 3rd straight win under Brad Shaw
